status.statusOverview: This page reports on the current status of the data shown in the system. Data is cached in your browser. More recent data may be available on the server.
status.refreshCycle: Statistical data is computed from the data dump about once per week. Basic statisics (class and property names, usage counts for properties, direct instances of classes) are refreshed more frequently, about once per hour. All other data is live.

about.aboutDescription: SQID is a project of the {kbsGroup} of {tuDresden}. Developers include {developersList}, and {lastDeveloper}.
about.aboutImplementation: SQID is programmed in TypeScript with additional server-side code in Java and Python to extract, query, and preprocess data.
about.meaningHypotheses: The origin of the name is unknown, but it seems to be an abbreviation of something. Current hypotheses include: {hypotheses} Another possible theory is that the name is indeed inspired by the high intelligence, amazing social skills, and sharp vision that are characteristic for many {squids} and Wikidata editors alike.
about.contribute: Where can I make comments and contributions?
about.contributions: All code is found in our {githubRepository}. Bugs and wishes are best reported by {submitIssue}. Pull requests are welcome.
